Sentencas: This paper proposes a neural network based adaptive constrained control scheme for a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: A novel adaptive neural network constrained control for solid oxide fuel cells via dynamic anti-windup

Sentencas: First, a radial basis function (RBF) neural network is designed for the identification of SOFC dynamic model.
Titulo: A novel adaptive neural network constrained control for solid oxide fuel cells via dynamic anti-windup

Sentencas: The Jacobian information can be obtained through the identified RBF model.
Titulo: A novel adaptive neural network constrained control for solid oxide fuel cells via dynamic anti-windup

Sentencas: Then, a back propagation (BP) neural network based PID controller is designed to tune the parameters that BP neural network has strong self-learning and adaptive capabilities.
Titulo: A novel adaptive neural network constrained control for solid oxide fuel cells via dynamic anti-windup

Sentencas: At same time, in order to solve the control input saturation and fuel utilization problems of SOFC, a dynamic anti-windup compensator is proposed for accommodating the reference.
Titulo: A novel adaptive neural network constrained control for solid oxide fuel cells via dynamic anti-windup

Sentencas: Moreover this paper theoretically proves the stability of the proposed method based on Lyapunov stability analysis.
Titulo: A novel adaptive neural network constrained control for solid oxide fuel cells via dynamic anti-windup

Sentencas: Finally, the simulation results for SOFC are provided to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed constrained control approach.
Titulo: A novel adaptive neural network constrained control for solid oxide fuel cells via dynamic anti-windup
A novel adaptive neural network constrained control for solid oxide fuel cells via dynamic anti-windup
A novel adaptive neural network constrained control for solid oxide fuel cells via dynamic anti-windup
